pr_title: bugfix: unsafe double-checked locking in SofaRegistryServiceImpl

timeline.message:
bugfix: unsafe double-checked locking

Because `DefaultRegistryClient` is in third-part jar, the `init` method invocation can't be moved to constructor.

So the local variable is used to correct DCL and minimize the number of field reads.

See also: https://lgtm.com/rules/1507076816054/

timeline.bodyText: You can continue to return registryClient, and result is used as a local transit variable, keeping the minimum changes.
timeline.author: zjinlei

replies.author: chenxi-null

replies.bodyText:
[RegistryClient result = registryClient] == [null == registryClient]
[result = registryClient] == [null == registryClient]
Same reading times, and here is singleton initialization, code readability is more important.
